code: import{Phone}from'@mui/icons-material';import{Avatar,Box,Breadcrumbs,Link,Paper,Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableContainer,TableHead,TableRow,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{blueGrey}from'@mui/material/colors';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useFetch}from'../../hooks';import{API,getURI}from'../../services';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodayNow=data=>{const meses=['Jan','Fev','Mar','Abr','Mai','Jun','Jul','Ago','Set','Out','Nov','Dez'];const dia=String(data.getDate()).padStart(2,'0');const mes=meses[data.getMonth()];const ano=data.getFullYear();const horas=String(data.getHours()).padStart(2,'0');const minutos=String(data.getMinutes()).padStart(2,'0');return"".concat(dia,"/").concat(mes,"/").concat(ano," ").concat(horas,":").concat(minutos);};export const StatusList=()=>{const[pilots,setPilots]=useState();const{data}=useFetch({url:getURI(API.status)});useEffect(()=>{if(data&&data.length){setPilots(data);}},[data]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{padding:'15px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Breadcrumbs,{"aria-label":"breadcrumb",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{underline:"hover",color:"inherit",href:"/",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{color:"text.primary",children:"Pilotos"})]})})}),pilots&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableContainer,{component:Paper,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableHead,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableRow,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{colSpan:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{color:"primary",variant:"h5",sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center'},children:["Liberados para decolagem.
